@Chandima Harshani ape minissunta 2015 ta kalin wechcha dewal dan mathaka ne. dan mathaka me anduwe adupadu. 70 wasarak une oka. Horagen parana horata balayaaru wima. ape rate minissu buddhimath kiuwata eka ehema nemei kiyala therenawa neda?

@Allex Fernando astavare patan gatte mugen tamai..tavat illanava rata kanna..

@Martin Luther  eka nan sahathika atta.Mahindata mona hari kiuwoth Ranilge patte kiyala kiyanawa.   Ranilta bannoth api Mahindage ptte kiyanwa. Me rate minissu pil dekakata bedila maragannawa. Depaththema horu tika deal danawa kopi bonawa. Rata agadeta yanawa. Aththatama ape lamai gana mata mara dukai.lamayek hadanna hithenneth ne me rate.mokada api me rate lamai hadana ekath papayak kiyala hithenawa.
@tik tok raniluth hora thama yako. Mahabankuwaa widda.me horu okkoma horakam karanne ape rate salli. E ka therum ganin. Anika uba kathakarana widiata mahindage kale jarawa hondata kapu ekek wage.
Horu tika okkoma inne. Pitipassata wela.
